description:
There’s no room for cold feet when it comes to the serious business of snow forts, sledding and snowballs. Multiple layers of weather protection in the Star 2 boots keep feet toasty during winter’s worst. With their easy pull lacing, they're easy to put on and take off with gloved or mittened hands.

  • Seam-sealed waterproof nylon upper
  • Kamik’s lightweight synthetic RubberHe is PVC-free, waterproof, durable and recyclable
  • RubberHe is rated to 1,000,000 flexes and is unaffected by weather down to -32°C, offering excellent traction in any weather
  • Nite Rays reflective accents help keep your little one seen in low light conditions
  • Plush faux fur collar holds the warmth in and keeps powdery snow out
  • Foam and fleece insulation keep feet warm
  • Moisture wicking liner
  • IceWave sole offers great grip in slippy winter conditions
  • Kamik rates these boots down to -40°C
name: Kamik Star 4 Winter Boots - Infants to Youths
